meta.title: Swap Crypto Instantly with the Lowest Fees - Rabbit Swap
meta.keywords: swap crypto, crypto exchange, cryptocurrency swap, cryptocurrency exchange, swap crypto with lowest fees, exchange coins, swap tokens, fast crypto exchange, swap coins, low-cost swaps, digital asset swap, quick coin swaps
meta.description: Exchange coins and tokens instantly with Rabbit Swap, the unique crypto exchange with the best rates. No sign-up required - swap coins with just one click!

hero.title: Crypto Swap Made Easy
hero.content: Exchange Bitcoin, Tether, Ethereum, and more than 3600 other cryptocurrencies with the lowest fees — no sign-up required. Choose a pair and get started!

how-to-swap.title: How to exchange crypto with Rabbit Swap?
how-to-swap.content: Using Rabbit Swap is easy and straightforward; below, you can find all the steps you need to take to swap your coins:

1.title: Create a Swap
1.content: Pick a coin pair and enter the desired amount in the form above.

2.title: Provide Your Address
2.content: Enter the address where you would like the exchanged crypto to be received.

3.title: Send Coins
3.content: Check the details and send your coins to the generated address.

4.title: Get Your Coins
4.content: Receive the exchanged crypto in a few moments!

best-rates.title: Best Rates Possible
best-rates.content: Rabbit Swap has a unique algorithm that dynamically compares rates from various liquidity providers, selecting the lowest one to ensure your exchanges always happen at the most profitable rates.

wide-limits.title: Lowest and Highest Limits
wide-limits.content: Having various liquidity providers also enables Rabbit Swap to offer a wide range of limits. You can exchange very small amounts as well as almost infinitely large ones.

features-grid.title: What Sets Rabbit Swap Apart?
features-grid.content: Rabbit Swap is designed to make the crypto swap process cost-effective, secure, fast, and as easy as sending a text message.

1.title: No Sign-Up Required
1.content: Exchange any amount of crypto with the lowest fees and almost instant speed — no sign-up required. It can be done in just a few clicks.

2.title: Wide Range of Supported Assets
2.content: Choose from more than 3600 coins and tokens available for swapping.

3.title: Respect for Privacy
3.content: Only anonymized information is used to perform an exchange. Rabbit Swap will never request any information except your address for receiving coins.

4.title: Jedi-Level Support
4.content: While all swaps are performed completely automatically, sometimes we need to talk to someone real. Chat with one of our supporters at any time of the day or night.

UnexpectedErrorPage.title: There seems to be a problem
UnexpectedErrorPage.subtitle: This is pretty embarrassing... the application has failed due to an unexpected error. Please reload the page or contact us at support@rabbit.io if this error happens repeatedly. We apologize for the inconvenience.

meta.title: Privacy Policy – Rabbit Swap
meta.description: Review Rabbit Swap's Privacy Policy for a clear understanding of how we handle your information on our cryptocurrency exchange platform. We prioritize transparency to ensure your privacy is protected throughout your experience.

errors.requests-limit-exceeded: Sorry, our service is experiencing a temporary interruption due to high demand. Please try again in a few minutes. We appreciate your understanding.
errors.default: Sorry, we failed to perform the last operation, please try again or contact support.

information-block.pair-not-available: Pair is not available now. Please, try again later or choose another pair.

meta.description: Please Enter the Required Details for {{fromTickerWithProtocol}} to {{toTickerWithProtocol}} Swap. Rabbit compares rates from diverse liquidity providers to secure the most optimal rate for your exchange.

cancel-swap-confirmation-step.title: Cancel the swap?
cancel-swap-confirmation-step.subtitle: Closing this will recalculate the current swap rate, potentially resulting in a worse or better deal. Just so you're aware.

unexpected-error-step.title: Something went wrong...
unexpected-error-step.subtitle: Unfortunately we failed to perform the last operation. Please refresh the page and try again. Or contact support if this error happens repeatedly. We apologize for the inconvenience.

rateModeDisclaimers.fixed: With a fixed rate, the exchange rate is locked in when the swap is created. This guarantees the exact amount you will receive, protecting against market fluctuations.
rateModeDisclaimers.floating: With a floating rate, the exchange rate may vary until the transaction is completed. This allows for potential market advantages but also carries the risk of rate changes.

SwapFlowCreationAmounts.title: Start a new swap
SwapFlowCreationAmounts.subtitle: Select a swap pair and enter an amount. Rabbit Swap will compare and pick the best rate among various liquidity providers based on the entered amount.

errors.amount-less-than-min-swappable: The amount of {{assetName}} you are trying to swap is below the accepted minimal amount.
errors.amount-higher-than-max-swappable: The amount of {{assetName}} you are trying to swap is exceeding the accepted maximum amount.
errors.pair-not-supported: Sorry, the selected pair is not available now. Please try again later or choose another pair.

SwapFlowCreationAddresses.title: Recipient Address
SwapFlowCreationAddresses.subtitle: Please specify the address where you would like to receive the {{toCoinName}}. In the unlikely event that the swap fails, you will be refunded to the provided {{fromCoinName}} refund address.
SwapFlowCreationAddresses.receiving-address-extra-id-notice: Please check if your recipient address requires a 'Memo' or 'Destination Tag' - sometimes called a tag, ID, label, or a note. Exchanges may require such ID for the deposit. Including this identifier is crucial when required, as omitting or misentering it can result in lost assets.
SwapFlowCreationAddresses.refund-address-extra-id-notice: Please check whether your refund address requires a 'Memo' or 'Destination Tag' (also referred to as a tag, ID, label, or note). It's crucial to include this identifier, as exchanges may need it to process incoming transactions accurately. Omitting or misentering it could lead to the loss of your funds.
SwapFlowCreationAddresses.address-is-contract-validation-message: The address you entered belongs to the {{ticker}} token contract address. Sending funds to it will result in losing your money irreversibly.

consents.consent-text: By clicking "Next" you agree with Rabbit Swap's

SwapFlowPaymentAwaiting.title: Awaiting your payment
SwapFlowPaymentAwaiting.subtitle: Please send the {{fromCoinName}} to the address below. The page will be updated automatically once the transaction is received.
SwapFlowPaymentAwaiting.extra-id-notice: Ensure you enter the required 'Memo' or 'Destination Tag' in your wallet when sending funds. This is crucial for correct transaction processing. Incorrect information may result in lost funds.

copy-amount-failed.title: Copying failed
copy-amount-failed.text: Sorry, we couldn't copy the send amount. Please refresh the page and try again.

copy-address-failed.title: Copying failed
copy-address-failed.text: Sorry, we couldn't copy the payment address. Please refresh the page and try again.

copy-swap-id-failed.title: Copying failed
copy-swap-id-failed.text: Sorry, we couldn't copy the swap ID. Please refresh the page and try again.

SwapFlowPaymentConfirming.title: Waiting for confirmation
SwapFlowPaymentConfirming.subtitle: Your transaction has been received. Please wait a moment for the transaction to be confirmed with blockchain. Once it's done the page will be updated automatically.

SwapFlowPaymentExchanging.title: Swapping your coins
SwapFlowPaymentExchanging.subtitle: Your transaction has been confirmed and the swap now is in progress. Please wait a moment for it to finish. Once it's done the page will be updated automatically.

SwapFlowPaymentCompleted.title: Swap completed!
SwapFlowPaymentCompleted.subtitle: Your swap is now completed and the coins have been sent to the provided address. Thank you for using Rabbit Swap.

SwapFlowPaymentRefunded.title: Swap refunded
SwapFlowPaymentRefunded.subtitle: We regret to inform you that your swap hasn't been completed and therefore refunded. Please contact the support team so we can check what happened. Use the Swap ID as a reference: {{swapId}}.

SwapFlowPaymentExpired.title: Swap expired
SwapFlowPaymentExpired.subtitle: Your transaction hasn't been received in time, and the swap is now expired. If you haven't sent anything, you can just create a new swap. If you already sent your coins, don't worry, just contact support so we can either recalculate the rate or send you a refund. Please use the Swap ID as a reference: {{swapId}}.

swap-not-found.title: Swap was not found!
swap-not-found.text: Sorry, swap with the provided id was not found.

swap-init-failed.title: Swap loading failed!
swap-init-failed.text: We've encountered an error while loading the swap details. Please reload the page and try again.

swap-details-loading-failed.title: Swap loading failed!
swap-details-loading-failed.text: We've encountered an error while loading the swap details. Please reload the page and try again.

requests-limit-exceeded.title: Swap service is overloaded!
requests-limit-exceeded.text: Sorry, our service is experiencing a temporary interruption due to high demand. Please try again in a few minutes. We appreciate your understanding.

maximum-amount-exceeded.title: Maximum amount exceeded
maximum-amount-exceeded.text: The amount you are trying to swap is exceeding the accepted maximum amount.

minimum-amount-not-reached.title: Minimal amount not reached
minimum-amount-not-reached.text: The amount you are trying to swap is below the accepted minimal amount.

pair-not-supported.title: Pair not available
pair-not-supported.text: Sorry, the selected pair is not available now. Please try again later or choose another pair.

default-error.title: Something went wrong...
default-error.text: Sorry, we failed to perform the last operation, please try again or contact support.

independent-exchange.title: Exchange Independently
independent-exchange.content: While most people conduct crypto swaps through various trading platforms, thereby entrusting their assets to these platforms, it is actually much safer to use independent exchange services such as Rabbit Swap. By doing so, you can still store your coins in secure, non-custodial wallets while performing your exchanges. This approach ensures that no one can ban or restrict your account, seize control of your coins, and ensures that the next FTX will not get away with all your coins, nor will you be affected if the SEC bans another of your favorite trading services.
